item.title: Aspose.PDF for JasperReports 18.9
item.description: This page contains release notes forÂ Aspose.PDF for JasperReports 18.9 Features and Improvements Key Summary Category PDFJR-33192 Implemented conversion to pptx format New Feature PDFJR-33186 Synchronize with latest JasperReports version 6.7.0 Enhancement PDFJR-33187 Update the JasperReports with Aspose.PDF version 18.8 Enhancement PDFJR-33185 Export filled and compiled jasper report to PDF Bug Public API Changes for version 18.
